title: What happen?
body: So I was playing a normal on my main account, 2-3 minutes in I lose connection. I checked my internet and it was still running. I logged and relogged I think almost 4 times and it wouldn’t let me connect at all. I just got on my smuf, played an aram and everything seems fine. Am I being hacked or something????

replies.body: This just happened to me. I have no idea what caused it, and now I have low priority queue and I lost 18 lp :/
Well at least it’s not a hacker, right? AhHA

Hey, are you still having this issue?  I haven't seen any issues with our servers, but this could have been ISP related or a local issue.  If the issue persists, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and get to the bottom of this.
is it similar to this issue? [link to issue I just had](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/4NfWgFod-500-ping-and-disconnect-issues)
